name: SysML v2 Attribute Extraction
description: Extract all attributes with their types and default values from a SysML v2 model.
prompt:
Extract all `attribute` declarations from this SysML v2 model.

Return a JSON array where each object contains:
- "name": the attribute name
- "type": the attribute type (after : or :>)
- "value": the default value if specified, or null
- "owner": the part/item def that contains this attribute

Example output format:
```json
[
  {"name": "orderID", "type": "String", "value": null, "owner": "GeneralOrder"},
  {"name": "temperature", "type": "Real", "value": "25.0", "owner": "Sensor"}
]
```

Include ALL attributes from all definitions.
